00083 class EGS_LINE_SHAPE_EXPORT EGS_LineShape : public EGS_BaseShape {
00084 
00085 public:
00086 
00087     EGS_LineShape(const vector<EGS_Float> &points, const string &Name="",
00088                   EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00089     ~EGS_LineShape() {
00090         if (n > 0) {
00091             delete table;
00092             delete [] x;
00093             delete [] y;
00094         }
00095     };
00096     EGS_Vector getPoint(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) {
00097         int j = table->sampleBin(rndm);
00098         EGS_Float eta = rndm->getUniform();
00099         EGS_Float eta1 = 1 - eta;
00100         return EGS_Vector(x[j]*eta+x[j+1]*eta1,y[j]*eta+y[j+1]*eta1,0);
00101     };
00102 
00103 protected:
00104 
00105     int  n;  // number of line segments
00106     EGS_Float *x, *y;
00107     EGS_AliasTable    *table;
00108 
00109 };
00110 
00111 #endif
